Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light pink-brown. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '313' Name Andrias. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0049.16.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (28)
